content: mandalas are so versatile they can be used as a modern twist for the traditional doily hooped to be used as a dream catcher pinned up as wall hangings or framed as a picture the sweet posy mandala is a quick and easy project with few technical stitches and is a great project for intermediate and ambitious beginners alike recommended yarn weight is worsted aran and with a hook size 4mm the finished mandala will measure approximately 30cm reproduction or publication of this pattern is not permitted however you are permitted to sell any finished products in low volumes please feel free to tag me in any photos you take of your finished product on instagram @confessionsofayarnaholic or use the hashtag #sweetposymandala
